questions.question: Why do we set a minimum market cap for small-cap screening?
options: To avoid micro-caps with extreme volatility and illiquidity
To focus only on large blue-chip stocks
questions.explanation: A floor improves liquidity and statistical reliability.

questions.question: If EPS growth = 15% and P/E = 20, what is the PEG ratio?
questions.explanation: PEG = P/E รท growth = 20 รท 15 = 1.33.

questions.question: Explain why tightening growth filters too much can reduce opportunities.
questions.answer_text: You may exclude stocks in early recovery or regime transition phases.
